Author: dcoolguy84
Title: ⭐[ANN] [ICO] ONAM Exchange - Globalizing Seamless Trading Under One Platform⭐
Body: We all have some fair idea of both advantages and disadvantages, if governments are supporting cryptos. Big +ve point is, blockchain provides seamless , faster means for cashless economy, this is good to keep up real currencies. Big -ve point is, seamless transfers to illegal activities too could take place, and on larger level, could impact real currency of impacting country. They have no clue how to keep control over -ve part. Thats where KYC comes into picture, and any major unfair deals could be tracked.

Many experts speculate, thats when big fishes started withdrawing and this heavy selling resulted in current crash. Although this isn't (read cannot be) authenticated by any exchanges, but then i don't see any other major reason for this huge crash since no big countries banned or put strict regulations on cryptos, still this crash occurred. But crash is good I guess, for more bigger jump in coming years when most of countries will understand importance of blockchain and will ease some rules for betterment of economy. Win win situation for both sides. :-)

Author: Guardsman
Title: ⭐[ANN] [ICO] ONAM Exchange - Globalizing Seamless Trading Under One Platform⭐
Body: Futures (futures contracts) - the most common type of derivatives. Under the terms of such a futures contract, its holder undertakes to buy or sell a certain amount of the underlying asset at a fixed price within a strictly agreed period. Futures can be sold and bought before their expiration date, and to complete these transactions you do not need to pay for the full value of the assets recorded in the futures contract. Only a part of the total value of the transaction, the so-called collateral, is transferred as security for the ownership of futures.

Author: ONAM_Official
Title: ⭐[ANN] [ICO] ONAM Exchange - Globalizing Seamless Trading Under One Platform⭐
Body: oops, sorry I guess I missed a question or two but nevertheless.  We have filed for Reg D and Reg S exemptions for our tokensale. They are called "Safe Harbor" exemptions. We have to notify the SEC that we will be conducting an offering that falls under SEC regulation but are exempt from registering our offering with them. Our legal team are also working on obtaining broker-dealer license, money transmitter license and working on registering ONAM trading platform as ATS (Alternative Trading System). We are hoping to share some good news with you guys by end of November regarding fiat as well.  We are working hard on exceeding the expectations of our investors and are far ahead of schedule.

Author: ONAM_Official
Title: ⭐[ANN] [ICO] ONAM Exchange - Globalizing Seamless Trading Under One Platform⭐
Body: On top of standard DDoS mitigation, anti-phishing, 2FA solutions, and encrypted databases we have developed our own proprietary Advanced Threat Prevention, Intrusion Detection, and Trade Surveillance systems powered by machine learning. With the help of machine learning technologies, we will be able to detect any irregular activities and our Advanced Threat Prevention system will flag any potential problems in real-time, preventing breaches before it is too late. This makes ONAM the most secure trading platform in the foreseeable future.  Utilizing our relationship with BitGo we will be storing 99% of funds in bank-grade Class III vaults to ensure the safety of the funds ONAM customers have entrusted us with.

Author: ONAM_Official
Title: ⭐[ANN] [ICO] ONAM Exchange - Globalizing Seamless Trading Under One Platform⭐
Body: Since we offer bot/automated trading within our platform, you don't need to connect APIs of various bots. It would eliminate the vulnerability other exchanges exposed to.  Also, with the help of machine learning technologies, we will be able to detect any irregular activities and our Advanced Threat Prevention system will flag any potential problems in real-time, preventing breaches before it is too late. This makes ONAM the most secure trading platform in the foreseeable future.
